title: New: 0.1 – Worm/Child Sing-A-Long
body: Maybe it’s his non-google friendly name or his admirable lack of self-promotion, but I’m still mystified as to how **0.** **1** aka **Bob Streckfuss** is seemingly so below most people’s radars. With twenty six beautiful, twisted and unflinchingly unique tracks on his [soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/0point1), it’s not as if there’s a lack of material to dive into, and certainly no omission of quality. New track _Worm/Child Sing-A-Long_ is a gorgeous, atmospheric number, playing to Streckfuss’s sampled angelic vocals and deep synth lines, almost like Sigur Ros meeting Balam Acab. If you haven’t already, I thoroughly recommend that you immerse yourself in the music of **0.1**. worm/child sing-a-long by 0.1
